Summary: seen red white an blue triangle
divs: Sighting Detailsit was 900pm i was going to get oil for stove, on the way back inoticed atriangle shaped object it had red blue an whiteyellow lights just sitting in thesky i pulled to the side of the road an looked it wasnt moving flashing ornothing so i pulled my blazer facing the object an started flashing my lights atit,. at first nothing happened but after a minute or two it started pulsingbritely,so i started up an drove twoard it,there was a field on my left so ipulled down to it as i walked in to it i saw a lightblue light in the field nextto me but at that same time it went out.so i looked up at the object i startedstriking my lighter because the field was dark,an i thought the object wouldnotice an so it did..an started moving closer to me at that same time a whiteobject apeared at the tree tops to my right for some reason i could not take myeyes off it i watched it til it went out of sight at that moment i turned tolook at the other object an it was right over my head an i was very scared so istarted getting out of the field as i left i noticed many objects an thayfollowed me ......i would very much like to tell the rest of what happened but iam not much of a typer an it takes me to long to type everything3E please...contact me ive had numerus sightings an odd experiences.my emailaddress is lloverly2@yahoo.com please please contact me
